#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

#define MAX 400002

int num [MAX];
int com3[MAX] = {-1};
int com4[MAX] = {-1};
int tests;
int mod = 100000007;
int i;

char getdigit(char c){
	if(c=='a' || c=='b' || c=='c') return '2';
	if(c=='d' || c=='e' || c=='f') return '3';
	if(c=='g' || c=='h' || c=='i') return '4';
	if(c=='j' || c=='k' || c=='l') return '5';
	if(c=='m' || c=='n' || c=='o') return '6';
	if(c=='p' || c=='q' || c=='r' || c=='s') return '7';
	if(c=='t' || c=='u' || c=='v') return '8';
	if(c=='w' || c=='x' || c=='y' || c=='z') return '9';
}

int getcount(char c){
	if(c=='a' || c=='d' || c=='g' || c=='j' || c=='m' || c=='p' || c=='t' || c=='w') return 1;
	if(c=='b' || c=='e' || c=='h' || c=='k' || c=='n' || c=='q' || c=='u' || c=='x') return 2;
	if(c=='c' || c=='f' || c=='i' || c=='l' || c=='o' || c=='r' || c=='v' || c=='y') return 3;
	if(c=='s' || c=='z') return 4;
}

void initialize()
{
	com3[0]=1; com3[1]=1; com3[2]=2; com3[3]=4; com3[4]=8; com3[5]=15;
	com4[0]=1; com4[1]=1; com4[2]=2; com4[3]=4; com4[4]=8; com4[5]=16;
	int x;
	for(x=6; x<MAX; x++)
	{
		com3[x]=((com3[x-1]+com3[x-2])%mod+com3[x-3]+1)%mod;
		com4[x]=((com4[x-1]+com4[x-2])%mod+com4[x-3]+com4[x-4]+1)%mod;
	}
}

int main(){
	initialize();
	cin>>tests;
	char s[MAX];
	char c, d1='0', d2='0';
	int j, count, len;
	long long combi;
	getchar();
	
	while(tests){
		combi=1LL;
		scanf("%s", s);
		len=strlen(s);
		d1=getdigit(s[0]);
		count=getcount(s[0]);
		for(j=1;j<len;j++)
		{
			d2=getdigit(s[j]);
			if(d1==d2)	count+=getcount(s[j]);
			else
			{
				if(d1=='7' ||d1=='9')
				{
					combi = (combi*(long long)com4[count])%mod;
				}
				else
				{
					combi = (combi*(long long)com3[count])%mod;
				}
				d1=getdigit(s[j]);
				count=getcount(s[j]);
			}
		}
		if(d2=='7' ||d2=='9')
				{
					combi = (combi*(long long)com4[count])%mod;
				}
				else
				{
					combi = (combi*(long long)com3[count])%mod;
				}
		cout<<combi<<endl;
		tests--;
	}
		
	return 0;
}
